text:
Compliantia | Front End / Fullstack Developer | Toronto, ON | Full-time | On-site | http://www.compliantia.com

Compliantia has a job opening for Front End Developer / Full Stack Software Developer, in Toronto, Ontario.

Complete details are available at http://compliantia.com/contact/careers/front-end/

We are a progressive company that is engineering-driven and offers a good work-balance. Also, while we feel and operate like a "startup", we are not a startup in at least one important respect: we are privately held, have no outside investors, no debt and are profitable! We are financially sound and growing and are looking at a creative and technically-strong candidate for the long term.

Contact us at careers@compliantia.com
